definitions: designed or produced to meet someone's individual requirements

examples.text: a steward will deliver personalized service to every passenger

shortDefinitions: designed or produced to meet someone's individual requirements

definitions: identifiable as belonging to a particular person, especially by being marked with their name or initials
shortDefinitions: identifiable as belonging to particular person

definitions: (of an issue, argument, etc.) concerned with personalities or feelings rather than with general or abstract matters

examples.text: general elections have become personalized contests between rival party leaders

shortDefinitions: (of issue, argument, etc.) concerned with personalities rather than with general matters

definitions: (especially of a deity or spirit) personified

examples.text: religious and magical systems involve personalized gods, spirits, or demons
